title: I received a 14 day suspension when I never even cursed?...
body: I was ganged up on by super toxic players in recent games who all reported be simply because they didn't like me which resulted in a 14 day ban. I talked to riot support and even the agent I spoke with said he thinks it was unjust. He said I can post on the board to help bring awareness to a faulty ban system and maybe reach out to Devs. The only reason the suspension couldn't be lifted was because I used the word "idiot" once to a player dropping F bombs on me, and honestly if that't not okay with riot then sure a chat restriction for using the word "idiot" is fine and makes sense because it's their rules (and the agent I spoke with agrees with me) but a 14 day suspension is insane!!

There's not a single line in that exchange where the support agent said it was unjustified. In fact, he explicitly said that there was no other choice but to give you the punishment you received.

 The punishment ladder is as follows: 10 game chat restriction > 25 game chat restriction > 14 day gameplay ban > permanent ban. As you repeatedly break rules, your account is placed on thinner and thinner ice meaning it requires less and less evidence to receive punishments. Also I would still like to see the chat logs because I still feel like you didn't just say "idiot" and cop a 14 day ban. It's possible but I doubt it.

 So yeah, unfortunately this punishment was justified as you've already had 2 punishments for toxicity and a warning on your reform card that said "Continued behavior could result in more chat restrictions or even account suspensions."

If you don't understand the exchange that's fine. What you and riot should know is that people change and I did and here we have a flaw in the system that should be fixed. I understand how the system works and most the time it does a good job.... just not this time :(

If you want to argue against your previous punishments you may, but this is about your current punishment. And your current punishment is due to recent behavior along with your previous record.

If you've recently had a 25-chat restriction and do something that would hand you a punishment, you get a 14-day ban. That's how the system works.
I just got banned for 14 days with no prior punishment or warnings

1.) This thread is nearly a year old. Necroing old threads is bad practice and is actually against the [Universal Board Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE). If you have a question about your own punishment or want to say something, it's best to make your own thread.

2.) While what the person you're replying to said is true, there are a few exceptions that can cause you to jump straight to a 14 day ban without any prior punishments: 

* You were banned for a gameplay related offense. Whether it was intentionally feeding, griefing, trolling, etc., the first punishment for all gameplay related offenses is a 14 day ban. This is because chat restrictions wouldn't make sense to give to these players since the problem is not in chat.

 
* You used certain zero-tolerance phrases in chat. Things like racial slurs or death threats/encouraging suicide skip over the chat restrictions and jump straight to a 14 day ban because Riot feels you shouldn't need to be told that these things are not okay to say in chat, thus the harsher punishment.

If neither of these applies to you, then I would recommend contacting Player Support and try to get an answer from them as to why you received the escalated punishment.

> I was ganged up on by super toxic players in recent games who all reported be simply because they didn't like me which resulted in a 14 day ban.

You don't get a 14-day ban for false reports. You broke some rules to get punished. As the Rioter answered to you, you were already previously warned about your behavior with a 10 and 25-game chat restrictions, and the next punishment from those is a 14-day ban. That's why you got a 14-day ban instead of a chat restriction, since the system saw that you were already issued chat bans 2 times and yet you haven't improved your behavior enough.

As far as I'm aware most punishments are not the result of a single game unless there is something that stands out as particularly offensive. The fact that several people have requested chat logs and you still haven't posted them gives the impression that there were some further comments on your side that would have contributed. From the screenshot you posted there is nothing from the support person stating that you should "post on the boards to draw awareness" and the claim that they agree with you about the ban being unjustified doesn't seem to be the case either, since the line you are referring to does not say that the punishment "should" have been less severe, but that it would have if you didn't have the prior offenses.

> He said I can post on the board to help bring awareness to a faulty ban system and maybe reach out to Devs.

Yeah, I stopped believing what you wrote as soon as I read this. I have never seen nor heard of support suggesting this. He may have said you can post on the boards to get the community's opinion on why you were punished, but I don';t believe for a second what you claim.
